content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

This week in Genesis, theme previews to whet your appetite, a new Genesis plugin, and a community member reaches out for support.

Themes

Imagely release a gorgeous new photography theme, Beckstead.

Don't miss this! Introducing Beckstead, Our Latest Photography Theme https://t.co/1A3QK3h8bw pic.twitter.com/sdWaUju5kF

— Imagely (@imagely) March 24, 2017

There’s also some great theme previews this week.

First up, a future StudioPress theme from Calvin Koepke, Canvas.

My first theme for @studiopress is in the works! –> https://t.co/wV2ffrODB8 #genesiswp

— Calvin (@cjkoepke) March 21, 2017

And Brian Gardner shares his latest work in progress, Monochome Pro.

Current status: Designing this —> https://t.co/5DWGrctKJh #genesiswp

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) March 21, 2017

The theme machine that is Seo Themes shares a preview of their latest, Limitless Pro.

Limitless Pro Genesis Child Theme by @seothemeswp: https://t.co/Zy2ofrc316 #WordPress #GenesisWP #Minimalism

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) March 23, 2017

You can also see a full preview of Jesse Petersen’s upcoming theme on GenesisThe.me on his new site, newlungsfor.me (more on that later).

Here’s a full teaser of my upcoming theme release. My first @_GenesisTheme for bloggers. #genesiswp https://t.co/84gbVTNyuu Anyone excited?

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) March 24, 2017

Showcase

PIXL Designs with a stunning new site for dare2sharelive.org

Our team is super stoked to release this sweet redesign of @Dare2Share’s https://t.co/tIN4VdyEI1 into the wild!#jointhemovement #genesiswp

— PIXL Designs (@pixldesigns) March 23, 2017

Pilcrow Pixel update their design for jamesmorgan.co.uk

A redesign/refresh for James Morgan’s photography and film site, just launched: https://t.co/OY60PJUT04 #GenesisWP #WordPress

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) March 22, 2017

A nice looking site for hatchify.co

Announcing the release of https://t.co/J6V3RC0Tuz. 200 hours on #GenesisWP. Thanks @studiopress for making me a better programmer. 👊

— igmnlt (@igimanaloto) March 25, 2017

Best of the rest

Seo Themes release a new plugin on GitHub, Genesis Hero.

New plugin available for #genesiswp users, Genesis Hero. Adds a hero section to Genesis child themes – https://t.co/h8n9JJ9V2e #WordPress

— Seo Themes (@seothemeswp) March 20, 2017

Sridhar Katakam shows you how to set the taxonomy title and description to appear only on the first page in Genesis…

How to set Taxonomy Title and Description to appear only on the first page in Genesis:https://t.co/DXFEgEJ0Di#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/jy7LZlNnXi

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) March 21, 2017

…and how to center an image logo with a right widget area in Genesis.

Centered image logo with right widget area in Genesis:https://t.co/ScQ0rsZBuI#GenesisWP pic.twitter.com/lroseyKL7M

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) March 26, 2017

Olivia Morris is looking for comments on improving her new blog, grammieknowshow.com

Genesis child theme Equilibre child theme

And finally…

Genesis community member Jesse Petersen’s appeal for support during a forthcoming double lung transplant was shared on WP Tavern this week and the Genesis community has been quick to offer their support.

A great way to invest back into the WordPress and #GenesisWP community. https://t.co/A27Wi8jsSo

— StudioPress (@studiopress) March 22, 2017

And, if you’d like to, you can donate here.

—

That’s all for this week.

Done something cool? Go add it. Want to support what I’m doing. Subscribe! Want even more Genesis stuff? Check the homepage.

Tell next time, let’s keep Genesis awesome.
